alert.note: Alert for Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 3:45PM CDT until July 18 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR HENDERSON...NORTHERN HARDIN...NORTHEASTERN CHESTER AND DECATUR COUNTIES... At 345 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Linden to near Mifflin, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Decaturville, Sardis, Reagan, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Wildersville, Parkers Crossroads, Darden, Montgomery, Scotts Hill, Saltillo, Milledgeville, Enville, Rock Hill, Pleasant Grove and Middle Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
